pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Brights Sea Mermaid
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf Ultra Bright's Live Colour Sea Mermaid is semi-permanent and provides maximum colour intensity to your hair that lasts up to 8 washes.

Express your colour creativity
- Full head
- Ombre
- Highlights

Recreate the latest trends and achieve stunning bright colours with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Ultra Bright's. The bold colours with built-in electrifying pigments deliver maximum intensity and vibrancy. 

Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour!

Gentle Conditioning Colour
- Enriched with a colour mask that adds superior condition and shine. 
- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia. 
- Will not lighten hair. 
- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes. 

Quick and easy to apply
- Shampoo and towel dry hair.
- Apply colour and leave on for 5 to 30 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.
- For long or thick hair we recommend using two or more packs. 

Snap me!
- Scan.
- Snap.
- Share. 
Ultra Bright's

Product Claims: Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes.

Boxed Contents: 30mL colour creme, instruction leaflet, gloves.

Size: 1 Pack

Warnings

This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to the accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye. Repeated exposure may cause sensitization.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

A strand test is recommended. On highlighted, bleached or streaked hair applying LIVE Colour may result in a more vibrant colour that may last longer than 8 washes. The darker your natural hair colour the less vibrant the result will be.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone 13 11 26; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If in eyes, wash out immediately with water.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Methylparaben, Parfum, Polyquaternium-6, Propylparaben, HC Blue No. 16, Etidronic Acid, Basic Yellow 87, Ethanolamine, Sodium Chloride.

Directions

See package insert.
